infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: CrateQuiet needs microphone access to detect your dog's barks and whines for effective crate training.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CrateQuiet uses the camera to capture training progress photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CrateQuiet needs photo library access to save training progress images.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow CrateQuiet to access your microphone to detect barks and whines.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow CrateQuiet to use your camera to capture training progress photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow CrateQuiet to save training progress photos to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow CrateQuiet to save training progress photos to your photo library.
